content: this afghan is worked in one piece in joined rounds one size pattern about 54 in 137 cm diameter rnds 1-3 = about 3 1/4 in 8 5 cm also available as a ** kit 1 ** pattern kit calls for 3 skeins of lion brand mandala yarn color moomba suggested 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/dreamcatcher-afghan-crochet
